name: Escape Asylum
description:
Player (first-person perspective) is located in an abandoned building, the building has the life tenacious zombie, alive to destroy all zombies can win; Players can find supplies on the table in the building, zombie to kill zombies to attack the head, body, lower body can be completely killed zombies.
Control keys:
1234 To switch weapons
Tab Equipment panel
WASD People move
The mouse Control the direction
Shift running
